lead_paragraph: Jose Ramos, previously sentenced to more than 12 years in prison, received an additional three to nine years after pleading guilty to conspiracy to kill a witness.
snippet: Jose Ramos, previously sentenced to more than 12 years in prison, received an additional three to nine years after pleading guilty to conspiracy to kill a witness.

headline.main: Former Officer Admits Crimes in Bronx Ticket-Fixing Scandal
headline.print_headline: Former Officer Admits Crimes in Bronx Ticket-Fixing Scandal
